document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph: General distribution. Palearctic, Indian subcontinent ( Pakistan ).

Host plants. On
Verbascum
sp. ( Scrophulariaceae ) (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
,
1997 b
;
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
), alfalfa (
Modarres Awal 1997 a
),
Apiaceae (
Heiss 2002
)
,
Vitex pseudo-negundo
( Verbenaceae ) (Sakenin et al .

2008 ), lucerne (
Hassanzadeh et al . 2009 b
),
Daucus
sp. ( Apiaceae ),
Echinops viscosus
( Asteraceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
),
Triticum aestivum
( Poaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
;
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
),
Acroptilon repens
( Asteraceae ),
Alhagi
sp. ( Fabaceae ),
Allium cepa
( Amaryllidaceae ),
Atriplex
sp., Chenopodum sp.,
Kochia
sp ( Chenopodiaceae ),
Berberis vulgaris
( Berberidaceae ),
Clematis
sp. ( Ranunculaceae ),
Euphorbia
sp. ( Euphorbiaceae ),
Hordeum vulgare
( Poaceae ),
Lycopersicum esculentum
( Solanaceae ),
Melissa
sp. ( Lamiaceae ),
Pimpinella anisum
( Apiaceae ),
Prunus domestica
( Rosaceae ),
Scorzonera
sp.,
Taraxacum
sp ( Asteraceae ), Scropholaria sp. ( Scrophulariaceae ),
Solanum tuberosum
( Solanaceae ),
Zygophyllum eurypterum
( Zygophyllaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
).
